item.title: Bessent says interviews for 'incredible group' of potential Fed chairs will start after Labor Day

item.title: 'Job hugging' has replaced job-hopping, consultants say, as workers cling to current roles
item.description: Workers are clinging to their jobs as they sour on their prospects in the labor market.
